item.title: Christi add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "You are a manipulator. I like to think of myself more as an outcome engineer." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jill Shalvis
Christi add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "I love books, by the way, way more than movies. Movies tell you what to think. A good book lets you choose a few thoughts for yourself." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Christi add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description:
"Barrons Books and Baubles had been ransacked!
Tables were overturned, books torn from shelves and strewn everywhere, baubles broken. Even my little TV behind the counter had been destroyed.
"Barrons?" I called warily. It was night and the lights were on. My illusory Alina had told me more than an hour had passed. Was it the same night, nearly dawn? Or was it the night following our theft attempt? Had Barrons come back from Wales yet? Or was he still there, searching for me? When I‘d been so rudely ripped from reality, who or what had come through those basement doors?
I heard footsteps, boots on hardwood, and turned expectantly toward the connecting doors.
Barrons was framed in the doorway. His eyes were black ice. He stared at me a moment, raking me from head to toe. "Nice tan, Ms. Lane. So, where the fuck have you been for the past month?" -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Christi add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "You're leaving me, Rainbow Girl." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Christi add a quote by Kristina Douglas
Christi add a quote by Allison Pang
item.description: "Did you learn to dress that way in Leather for Bad Boys one-oh-one?" -- Allison Pang

item.title: Christi add a quote by Allison Pang
item.description: "Another chunk of my childhood dreams had just run down the reality drain in the form of a horny unicorn, no less." -- Allison Pang

item.title: Christi add a quote by Allison Pang
item.description: "I had a naked incubus in my bedroom. With a frying pan of half-cooked bacon, and a hard-on. And a unicorn bite on his ass. Christ, this was turning out to be a weird morning." -- Allison Pang

item.title: Christi add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "Well, you missed out on some important protocol, Ella. You can't stand between a Texan and his power tools. We like them. Big ones that drain the national grid. We also like truck-stop breakfasts, large moving objects, Monday night football, and the missionary position. We don't drink light beer, drive Smart cars, or admit to knowing the names of more than about five or six colors. And we don't wax our chests, ever." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "Ask me if I sparkle and I’ll kill you where you stand.” (Bones)" -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "What the hell was that?” I gasped. “Premature inflammation,” he replied. “Happens sometimes. Very embarrassing. I don’t like to talk about it." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "See?” I’d whispered to Bones, nudging him with a grin. “He never argues with her. Isn’t that sweet?” A snort preceded his response. “Keep dreaming, pet." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description:
"Then you remember the dream,” Mencheres stated. “That bodes ill.”
The fear of that made my reply snappy. “Hey, Walks Like An Egyptian, how about for once you drop the formal stuff and talk like you live in the twenty-first century?”
The shit’s gonna splatter, start buggin’, yo,” Mencheres responded instantly.
I stared at him, then burst out laughing, which was highly inappropriate considering the very grave warning he’d just conveyed." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Christi add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description:
"My fore-parts, as you so ineloquently put it, have names.”
I pointed to my right breast. “This is Danger.” Then my left. “And this is Will Robinson. I would appreciate it if you addressed them accordingly.”
After a long pause in which he took the time to blink several times, he asked, “You named your breasts?”
I turned my back to him with a shrug. “I named my ovaries, too, but they don’t get out as much." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Christi add a quote by Julie James
Christi add a quote by Maya Banks
item.description: "When would he learn that women never stayed where you put them?" -- Maya Banks

item.title: Christi add a quote by Larissa Ione
item.description: "She'd read somewhere that normal, healthy men got up to twenty erections a day. Um...yep, Ares was definitely healthy." -- Larissa Ione

item.title: Christi add a quote by Dakota Cassidy
item.description: "Nina chuckled, giving Katie her infamous devilish grin. "It means you aren't just a werecougar, lady. You're a cougar-cougar. You took stereotyping to a whole 'nother level. You're like one of those 'doesn't look her age' chicks who hits on young dudes because they got the zoom in their boom still happening. You're a total label. Hot. Niiiice work, Mrs. Robinson." -- Dakota Cassidy

item.title: Christi add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I came to you, Jane. Every night this week, I came to you. I didn't want you to be alone. And I didn't want to sleep without you." -Vishous" -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christi add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "His cheeks were slick with tears that spilled over his diamond eyes, a ceaseless flow he neither noticed nor appeared to care about. And she had a feeling it was going to be a while before the leaking stopped-an inner artery had been nicked and this was the blood of his heart, spilling out of him, covering him." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christi add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "Vishous screamed. The only thing that was louder was the pop as the hip was relocated, as it were. And the last thing he saw before he checked out of the Conscious Inn & Suites was Jane's head whipping around in a panic. In her eyes was stark terror, as if the single worst thing that she could imagine was him in agony... And that was when he knew that he still loved her." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christi add a quote by Lora Leigh
item.description:
"Am I horny enough to hump a bedpost?" Mica asked. "Not quite yet. Should I consult with you first, Doctor?" Sarcasm lay thick and heavy in her voice.
"I believe a consult would be a good idea." Ely nodded with mocking solemnity as Mica lifted herself onto the gurney. "You never know what you may end up hurting if the act isn't done properly." -- Lora Leigh

item.title: Christi add a quote by Lora Leigh
item.description: "I didn't promise I wouldn't break your tender heart, Mica. Protect it from me. Don't let me touch that part of you. Don't let me destroy both of us that way." -- Lora Leigh

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jill Shalvis
item.description: "Today is the last day of some of your life. Don't waste it." quote from Tara Daniels" -- Jill Shalvis

item.title: Christi add a quote by Jill Shalvis
item.description: "If I looked like him,” Tara said. “I’d want to have sex with myself. All the time." -- Jill Shalvis

item.title: Christi add a quote by Kristan Higgins
item.description: "You asked why I couldn't forgive you," Nick said, very quietly, and I jumped a little. "It was because you were the love of my life, Harper. And you didn't want to be. That's hard to let go." -- Kristan Higgins

item.title: Christi add a quote by Julie James
item.description: "I've been in love with you since the very beginning. You asked why there isn't anyone else in my life, and the reason... is you." -- Julie James

item.title: Christi add a quote by Julie James
Christi add a quote by Julie James
item.description: "Raise your hand if you had no idea you’d see so much nudity in one week of jury duty.” Twelve hands flew straight into the air. And unbelievably, Payton laughed." -- Julie James
